definitions.definition: A Russian martial art , first appearing in the 1990s, involving a wide variety of fighting styles , including hand-to-hand combat , grappling , knife -fighting and firearms (with the specific elements usually dictated by the individual school ).

main_definition: A Russian martial art , first appearing in the 1990s, involving a wide variety of fighting styles , including hand-to-hand combat , grappling , knife -fighting and firearms (with the specific elements usually dictated by the individual school ).
